mapper.select: INSERT INTO t_proxy_info (proxy_type, proxy_protocol, host, port, username, password, usable, params, insert_datetime, update_datetime, is_valid) VALUES (#{proxyType}, #{proxyProtocol}, #{host}, #{port}, #{username}, #{password}, #{usable}, #{params}, #{insertDatetime}, #{updateDatetime}, #{isValid}) ON CONFLICT(host, port) DO UPDATE SET proxy_type = excluded.proxy_type, proxy_protocol = excluded.proxy_protocol, username = excluded.username, password = excluded.password, usable = excluded.usable, params = excluded.params, update_datetime = excluded.update_datetime;
